name: Geany
description: Geany is a cross-platform open-source IDE. It supports basic syntax highlighting, automatic code completion, call prompt and plugin extension. The file types supported include C, CPP, Java, Python, PHP, HTML, DocBook, Perl, LateX and Bash scripts.

en_US.description: Geany is a cross-platform open-source IDE. It supports basic syntax highlighting, automatic code completion, call prompt and plugin extension. The file types supported include C, CPP, Java, Python, PHP, HTML, DocBook, Perl, LateX and Bash scripts.
en_US.name: Geany

zh_CN.description: Geany是一个跨平台的开源集成开发环境，它支持基本的语法高亮、代码自动完成、调用提示、插件扩展。支持文件类型有C、CPP、Java、Python、PHP、 HTML、DocBook、Perl、LateX和Bash脚本。
zh_CN.name: Geany
